description: This drawing represents a ship sailing in the sea. It includes an elliptical hull, rectangular deck, cylindrical smokestack, circular portholes, vertical mast with a wedge-shaped flag, and curved waves. All components are positioned proportionally using calculated coordinates.

drawing.description: Ship hull. Centered horizontally (720) with vertical position 450. RadiusX 300 creates horizontal elongation, RadiusY 80 maintains shallow draft proportion.
Bow section. Starting from hull's left edge (420,450), curving upward to create pointed bow shape. Control points create smooth naval curve.
Main deck. Positioned 100px above hull center (450-100=350). Width 400 (2/3 of hull length) centered with left at 720-200=520.
Smokestack. Positioned on deck's right side (800=520+400-60-60). Height 100 extends above deck to y250.
Smokestack top. Centered on smokestack (800+30=830). Elliptical shape creates 3D perspective effect.
Porthole. First in series of 4, spaced 60px apart (600,660,720,780). Vertical position 380 centers on deck.
Main mast. Extends from deck center (720,350-50=300) to 200px height. 4px width for structural emphasis.
Ship flag. Positioned at mast top (720,200). 30° wedge rotated 60° creates dynamic pennant shape.
Sea waves. Sinusoidal pattern with alternating control points. Amplitude ±15px creates realistic wave motion effect under hull.
Bow wave. Centered below hull front (720,450+80=530). 180° arc creates foaming water effect at ship's cutting edge.
